name: FBLA 365
description:
Play as Kevin, an aspiring FBLA chapter president with big dreams and three days to make them happen. Gain enough favor around your school by completing students' tasks to be elected by the end of the game.

I created this game with a peer as part of the FBLA Computer Game and Simulation Programming competition. It placed first in the district and went on to compete on the state level. We both wrote the code in equal parts, but the graphics and music were found open-source online.

Controls: W, A, S, and D to move. Space to interact/talk. T to toggle player profile.
